title: I WILL NEVER QUIT, NO MATTER THE CIRCUMSTANCES - Motivational Speech (Featuring Demetrius Thigpen)
itunes:title: I WILL NEVER QUIT, NO MATTER THE CIRCUMSTANCES - Motivational Speech (Featuring Demetrius Thigpen)
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Every time you quit you betray the gift that life has given you. It's not over when you lose, it's over when you quit. It's time to change your life with this powerful new motivational speech and our first release with Demetrius Thigpen.


"Tough times build tough people. Don't quit."


Speaker:


Demetrius Thigpen: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8B3...


Music:


Audiojungle


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
